data.sampled: Yes (Y). If there is no safety zone for stopping and if you stop the roadside electric car on the street without a safe area, it's possible to pass slowly through if there is more than 1.5 meters of space between your vehicle and the roadside electric car. Always follow traffic rules and regulations while operating any vehicle to ensure everyone's safety.
